# ramalama version.1

## Synopsis
**ramalama version**

## Description
Print version of RamaLama

## Options

#### **--help**, **-h**
Print usage message

## Examples

```bash
$ ramalama version
ramalama version 0.11.1
$ ramalama -q version
0.11.1
>
```
